An Introduction to R Vittorio Perduca (Université de Paris) September 2020 1 Welcome This document is a tutorial for self-learning the basic use of R. It was prepared for the students enrolled in the first year of the AIRE Life Sciences Master Program of the Centre de Recherche Interdisciplinaire at the Université de Paris. This document was written in RMarkdown with bookdown and is under continuous development, please report any issues to vittorio.perduca@u-paris.fr. This work is licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0.
